### Changes to LTBI Prevalence in Targeted Population 

##### Example Applications 
```{r, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE,echo=FALSE, fig.width=7.5, fig.height=6.5}
library(MITUS)
model_load()
prgchng<-def_prgchng(Par[1,])
ttt_list<-def_ttt()
results<-OutputsZint(1, Par, "US", prg_chng = prgchng, ttt_list=ttt_list)
ltbi_count_bc<-cbind(2018:2049,rowSums(results[69:100,55:76]))
tb_count_bc<-cbind(2018:2049,rowSums(results[69:100,136:146]+results[69:100,189:199]))
tltbi_count_bc<-cbind(2018:2049,results[69:100,155])
tx_comp_bc<-cbind(2018:2049,results[69:100,132])

#screen 10 million in 2020-29 with 5 times progression rate 
model_load()
ttt_list_1<-def_ttt()
ttt_list_1[[3]]<-.5
ttt_list_1[[4]]<-1
ttt_list_1[[5]]<-2020
ttt_list_1[[6]]<-2021
ttt_list_1[[9]]<-1

results_1<-OutputsZint(1, Par, "US", prg_chng = prgchng, ttt_list=ttt_list_1)
tb_count_1<-cbind(2018:2049,rowSums(results_1[69:100,136:146]+results_1[69:100,189:199]))
ltbi_count_1<-cbind(2018:2049,rowSums(results_1[69:100,55:76]))
tltbi_count_1<-cbind(2018:2049,results_1[69:100,155])
tx_comp_1<-cbind(2018:2049,results_1[69:100,132])

#screen 10 million in 2020-29 with 5 times mortality rate 
model_load()
ttt_list_2<-def_ttt()
ttt_list_2[[3]]<-.5
ttt_list_2[[4]]<-1
ttt_list_2[[5]]<-2020
ttt_list_2[[6]]<-2021
ttt_list_2[[9]]<-2

results_2<-OutputsZint(1, Par, "US", prg_chng = prgchng, ttt_list=ttt_list_2)
tb_count_2<-cbind(2018:2049,rowSums(results_2[69:100,136:146]+results_2[69:100,189:199]))#*1E6
ltbi_count_2<-cbind(2018:2049,rowSums(results_2[69:100,55:76]))#*1E6
tltbi_count_2<-cbind(2018:2049,results_2[69:100,155])
tx_comp_2<-cbind(2018:2049,results_2[69:100,132])

#screen 10 million in 2020-29 with 5 times prevalence rate 
model_load()
ttt_list_3<-def_ttt()
ttt_list_3[[3]]<-.5
ttt_list_3[[4]]<-1
ttt_list_3[[5]]<-2020
ttt_list_3[[6]]<-2021
ttt_list_3[[9]]<-5

results_3<-OutputsZint(1, Par, "US", prg_chng = prgchng, ttt_list=ttt_list_3)
tb_count_3<-cbind(2018:2049,rowSums(results_3[69:100,136:146]+results_3[69:100,189:199]))#*1E6
ltbi_count_3<-cbind(2018:2049,rowSums(results_3[69:100,55:76]))#*1E6
tltbi_count_3<-cbind(2018:2049,results_3[69:100,155])
tx_comp_3<-cbind(2018:2049,results_3[69:100,132])

#screen 10 million in 2020-29 no change in anything
model_load()
ttt_list_4<-def_ttt()
ttt_list_4[[3]]<-.5
ttt_list_4[[4]]<-1
ttt_list_4[[5]]<-2020
ttt_list_4[[6]]<-2021
ttt_list_4[[9]]<-10

results_4<-OutputsZint(1, Par, "US", prg_chng = prgchng, ttt_list=ttt_list_4)
tb_count_4<-cbind(2018:2049,rowSums(results_4[69:100,136:146]+results_4[69:100,189:199]))#*1E6
ltbi_count_4<-cbind(2018:2049,rowSums(results_4[69:100,55:76]))#*1E6
tltbi_count_4<-cbind(2018:2049,results_4[69:100,155])
tx_comp_4<-cbind(2018:2049,results_4[69:100,132])


#plot one - Active TB

plot(0,0,ylim=c(0,max(tb_count_4[,2]))*1e6,xlim=c(2018,2049),xlab="",ylab="",axes=F,col=NA)
axis(1);axis(2,las=2);box()
# lines(x=tb_count_bc[,1],y=tb_count_bc[,2], type = "p")
lines(x=tb_count_bc[,1],y=tb_count_1[,2]*1e6, col="red")
lines(x=tb_count_bc[,1],y=tb_count_2[,2]*1e6, col="blue")
lines(x=tb_count_bc[,1],y=tb_count_3[,2]*1e6, col="darkgreen")
lines(x=tb_count_bc[,1],y=tb_count_4[,2]*1e6, col="orange")

mtext("Year",1,2.5,cex=1.2)
mtext("TB Notifications",3,.8,font=2,cex=1)
legend("topright",c("screen 5 RRLTBI=1","screen 5 RRLTBI=2", "screen 5 RRLTBI=5", "screen 5 RRLTBI=10"),cex=1,
       pch=c(15,15,15,15),lwd=c(NA,NA,NA,NA),lty=c(NA,NA,NA,NA),col=c("red", "blue", "darkgreen", "orange"),bg="white",pt.cex=c(1.8,1.8,1.8, 1.8)
)

tb_count_1a<-(tb_count_1-tb_count_bc)*1e6
tb_count_2a<-(tb_count_2-tb_count_bc)*1e6
tb_count_3a<-(tb_count_3-tb_count_bc)*1e6
tb_count_4a<-(tb_count_4-tb_count_bc)*1e6
plot(0,0,ylim=c(min(tb_count_4a),0),xlim=c(2018,2049),xlab="",ylab="",axes=F,col=NA)
axis(1);axis(2,las=2);box()
# lines(x=tb_count_bc[,1],y=tb_count_bc[,2], type = "p")
lines(x=tb_count_bc[,1],y=tb_count_1a[,2], col="red")
lines(x=tb_count_bc[,1],y=tb_count_2a[,2], col="blue")
lines(x=tb_count_bc[,1],y=tb_count_3a[,2], col="darkgreen")
lines(x=tb_count_bc[,1],y=tb_count_4a[,2], col="orange")

mtext("Year",1,2.5,cex=1.2)
mtext("Reduction in TB Notifications from the Basecase",3,.8,font=2,cex=1)
legend("topright",c("screen 5 RRLTBI=1","screen 5 RRLTBI=2", "screen 5 RRLTBI=5", "screen 5 RRLTBI=10"),cex=1,
       pch=c(15,15,15,15),lwd=c(NA,NA,NA,NA),lty=c(NA,NA,NA,NA),col=c("red", "blue", "darkgreen", "orange"),bg="white",pt.cex=c(1.8,1.8,1.8, 1.8)
)

plot(0,0,ylim=c(0,max(ltbi_count_4[,2]))*1e6,xlim=c(2018,2049),xlab="",ylab="",axes=F,col=NA)
axis(1);axis(2,las=2);box()
# lines(x=ltbi_count_bc[,1],y=ltbi_count_bc[,2], type = "p")
lines(x=ltbi_count_bc[,1],y=ltbi_count_1[,2]*1e6, col="red")
lines(x=ltbi_count_bc[,1],y=ltbi_count_2[,2]*1e6, col="blue")
lines(x=ltbi_count_bc[,1],y=ltbi_count_3[,2]*1e6, col="darkgreen")
lines(x=ltbi_count_bc[,1],y=ltbi_count_4[,2]*1e6, col="orange")

mtext("Year",1,2.5,cex=1.2)
mtext("LTBI Notifications",3,.8,font=2,cex=1)
legend("topright",c("screen 5 RRLTBI=1","screen 5 RRLTBI=2", "screen 5 RRLTBI=5", "screen 5 RRLTBI=10"),cex=1,
       pch=c(15,15,15,15),lwd=c(NA,NA,NA,NA),lty=c(NA,NA,NA,NA),col=c("red", "blue", "darkgreen", "orange"),bg="white",pt.cex=c(1.8,1.8,1.8, 1.8)
)

#plot two - LTBI
ltbi_count_1a<-(ltbi_count_1-ltbi_count_bc)*1e3
ltbi_count_2a<-(ltbi_count_2-ltbi_count_bc)*1e3
ltbi_count_3a<-(ltbi_count_3-ltbi_count_bc)*1e3
ltbi_count_4a<-(ltbi_count_4-ltbi_count_bc)*1e3
plot(0,0,ylim=c(min(ltbi_count_4a),0),xlim=c(2018,2049),xlab="",ylab="",axes=F,col=NA)
axis(1);axis(2,las=2);box()
# lines(x=ltbi_count_bc[,1],y=ltbi_count_bc[,2], type = "p")
lines(x=ltbi_count_bc[,1],y=ltbi_count_1a[,2], col="red")
lines(x=ltbi_count_bc[,1],y=ltbi_count_2a[,2], col="blue")
lines(x=ltbi_count_bc[,1],y=ltbi_count_3a[,2], col="darkgreen")
lines(x=ltbi_count_bc[,1],y=ltbi_count_4a[,2], col="orange")


mtext("Year",1,2.5,cex=1.2)
mtext("Reduction LTBI Population Compared to BaseCase (in thousands)",3,.8,font=2,cex=1)
legend("topright",c("Screen .5 RRLTBI=1","Screen .5 RRLTBI=2", "Screen .5 RRLTBI=5", "Screen .5 RRLTBI=10"),cex=1,
       pch=c(15,15,15,15),lwd=c(NA,NA,NA,NA),lty=c(NA,NA,NA,NA),col=c("red", "blue", "darkgreen", "orange"),bg="white",pt.cex=c(1.8,1.8,1.8, 1.8)
)

##plot three total TLTBI inits 
tltbi_count_1a<-(tltbi_count_1-tltbi_count_bc)*1e3
tltbi_count_2a<-(tltbi_count_2-tltbi_count_bc)*1e3
tltbi_count_3a<-(tltbi_count_3-tltbi_count_bc)*1e3
tltbi_count_4a<-(tltbi_count_4-tltbi_count_bc)*1e3
plot(0,0,ylim=c(min(tltbi_count_4a),max(tltbi_count_4a)),xlim=c(2018,2049),xlab="",ylab="",axes=F,col=NA)
axis(1);axis(2,las=2);box()
# lines(x=tltbi_count_bc[,1],y=tltbi_count_1[,2], type = "p")
lines(x=tltbi_count_bc[,1],y=tltbi_count_1a[,2], col="red")
lines(x=tltbi_count_bc[,1],y=tltbi_count_2a[,2], col="blue")
lines(x=tltbi_count_bc[,1],y=tltbi_count_3a[,2], col="darkgreen")
lines(x=tltbi_count_bc[,1],y=tltbi_count_4a[,2], col="orange")

mtext("Year",1,2.5,cex=1.2)
mtext("Additional TLTBI Initations in True Positive Compared to Basecase (in thousands)",3,.8,font=2,cex=1)
legend("topright",c("Screen .5 RRLTBI=1","Screen .5 RRLTBI=2", "Screen .5 RRLTBI=5", "Screen .5 RRLTBI=10"),cex=1,
       pch=c(15,15,15,15),lwd=c(NA,NA,NA,NA),lty=c(NA,NA,NA,NA),col=c("red", "blue", "darkgreen", "orange"),bg="white",pt.cex=c(1.8,1.8,1.8, 1.8)
)
```
